title:
Cordless Handheld Standard Range Area Imager Kit with Presentation Cradle and USB Kit, Black,
Compatible Devices: Laptop, Desktop, Power Source: Corded Electric, Usb Cable, 3 AAA batteries required.
descriptions:
Power through checkouts and inventory with the Zebra Cordless Handheld Standard Range Area Imager Kit. Built for busy retail and hospitality environments, this lightweight, ergonomic scanner delivers fast, accurate 1D/2D barcode capture—no fumbling, no delays.

Why you’ll love it:
- Cordless convenience with presentation cradle: scan hands-free at the counter or grab and go for mobile tasks.
- Plug-and-scan simplicity: pre-configured out of the box with auto-host USB cables to get you up and running in minutes.
- Omni-directional performance: read barcodes from any angle, even on screens and poorly printed labels, guided by a crisp aim line for first-time accuracy.
- Flexible power options: operate via corded electric, USB cable, or 3 AAA batteries—ideal for uninterrupted workflows.
- Built for comfort: lightweight, ergonomic design reduces fatigue during long shifts.

Designed for laptops and desktops, this general-purpose imager is perfect for point-of-sale, inventory, ticketing, and guest check-in. Choose Zebra reliability to speed lines, reduce errors, and give customers a smoother experience—every time.
